definition: to fail to show up for work
to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting

sentences.english: To be absent for consecutive three days without justifiable grounds or be absent for six days in a month.
sentences.chinese: 無正常理由連續曠職三日或一個月內曠職達六日者。

sentences.english: Being absent from duty for three (3) or more consecutive days or six (6) days in a month without justification.
sentences.chinese: 無正當理由連續曠職三日以上或一個月內達六天者。

sentences.english: Being absent from duty for 3 or more consecutive days or 6 days per a month without justification.
